title: Sophie and the Wax Doll (Bilingual)
description: One day, Sophie receives a special present from her father: a wax doll! But the doll looks a little cold… so Sophie decides to warm her in the sun. Poor wax doll, what will happen to you now?Sophie and the Wax Doll is a bilingual story, told in both French and English. It uses simple, modern language and includes games to help with reader comprehension and vocabulary review. Featuring a little girl who is always getting into trouble, this book and its two sequels are adaptations of a classic French book for children: Les Malheurs de Sophie (Sophie's Misfortunes).
author: Comtesse de Ségur
